roleset.name: cause damage
roleset.note: HARM-V NOTES: To avoid excessive agonizing over the agent/instrument distinction,only use arg2 when arg0 is also present. (from harm.01-v)
HARMING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, harm-v.01, harm-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from harming.01-n)
HARM-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to harm.01. VN class amuse-31.1. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from harm.01-n)

example.name: nice and simple
example.text: She said there is ``growing realization'' around the world that denial of intellectual-property rights harms all trading nations, and particularly the ``creativity and inventiveness of an offending country's own citizens.''
example.arg: all trading nations, and particularly the ``creativity and inventiveness of an offending country's own citizens

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Critics of poison pills argue that they harm shareholders by letting corporate management defeat takeover bids at premium prices...
example.arg: by letting corporate management defeat takeover bids at premium prices

example.name: passivized non-agentive subject
example.text: The class-action suit highlights shortcomings of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline Liability Fund, which gets its money from oil companies using the pipeline and compensates those harmed by oil spills.

example.name: unusual preposition introducing passivized subject
example.text: Although [the average citizen]-1 is probably not harmed *trace*-1 too much from Washington's rhetorical war against Wall Street regarding excessive financial leveraging, actual legislation would probably impose considerable harm.
example.arg: from Washington's rhetorical war against Wall Street regarding excessive financial leveraging

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: My arms had started to look a mess because of my self-harming, so I decided to take action and see a counsellor.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: hello , i am a 12 year old girl -LRB- 13 in two days -RRB- who is addicted to self harming .

example.name: this often occurs with light verbs
example.text: And they want [PRO-1] to do harm to Lebanon.

example.name: the location here doesn't count as arg 1 because you could still have something in that village that was explicitly damaged
One more with a light verb
example.text: And for people to leak that program and for a newspaper to publish it does great harm to the United States of America
example.arg: for people to leak that program and for a newpaper to publish it
to the United States of America

roleset.name: tending to cause damage
roleset.note: HARMFUL-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to harm.01. Harm.01 is a member of VN class amuse-31.1. Framed by Katie. (from harmful.01-j)

example.name: use arg 0
example.text: Treatment with chemotherapy might be more harmful.
